abstract: Leonida Christos "Leo" Bertos (born 20 December 1981) is a New Zealand football player who plays as an attacking midfielder or right winger for New Zealand-based A-League team Wellington Phoenix and has represented the New Zealand national football team. He is sponsored by the sportwear company Adidas.
